channel.title: Comments on: Valentines Haters To Lovers

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: Lol. I rarely do much for VDay... too commercialized for my taste, though it makes a convenient excuse for a nice dinner or some special chocolate or something. This year, though, we spent VDay shivering and trying to hunt down the last bits of firewood for sale in the county, since the power was out all day. (70,000 people without power... word has it the county was setting up shelters last night.)
item.content:encoded: Lol. I rarely do much for VDay… too commercialized for my taste, though it makes a convenient excuse for a nice dinner or some special chocolate or something. This year, though, we spent VDay shivering and trying to hunt down the last bits of firewood for sale in the county, since the power was out all day. (70,000 people without power… word has it the county was setting up shelters last night.)
